plugin.name: Postgres
plugin.description: Management and monitoring of PostgreSQL versions 8.2 and higher

c:simple-property.name: host
c:simple-property.description: the hostname or IP address that the database is listening on

c:simple-property.name: port
c:simple-property.description: the TCP port that the database is listening on

c:simple-property.name: db
c:simple-property.description: the name of the database to connect to

c:simple-property.name: driverClass
c:simple-property.description: the fully-qualified classname of the JDBC driver class

c:simple-property.name: principal
c:simple-property.description: the database role to connect as

c:simple-property.name: credentials
c:simple-property.description: the password for the database role being used to connect

c:simple-property.name: pgdataDir
c:simple-property.description: the absolute path to the directory containing the cluster configuration files postgresql.conf, pg_hba.conf, and pg_ident.conf

c:simple-property.name: configFile
c:simple-property.description: the absolute path to the main cluster configuration file; default value is '{pgDataDir}/postgresql.conf', where [pgDataDir] is the value of the pgDataDir connection property

operation.name: listProcessStatistics
operation.description: List statistics about the currently executing postgres backends. state column result is only available with Postgres 9.2+

metric.description: The aggregate amount of CPU user time spent by all postgres processes
The aggregate amount of CPU kernel time spent by all postgres processes
The percentage of CPU currently being used by all postgres processes
The aggregate amount of resident memory used by all postgres processes
The aggregate amount of virtual memory used by all postgres processes
The aggregate number of file descriptors open by all postgres processes
Number of currently active backends (user connections)
Start time of the PostgreSQL database server

c:simple-property.name: port
c:simple-property.description: Sets the TCP port the server listens on; default value is '5432'.

c:simple-property.name: max_connections
c:simple-property.description: Sets the maximum number of concurrent connections; default value is '100'.

c:simple-property.name: shared_buffers
c:simple-property.description: Sets the number of the shared memory buffers used by the server; default value is typically '1000'.

c:simple-property.name: max_fsm_pages
c:simple-property.description: Maximum FSM Pages, must be a minimum of max_fsm_relations*16, 6 bytes each)

c:simple-property.name: log_destination
c:simple-property.description: Available options depend on operating system; default value is 'stderr'

c:simple-property.name: redirect_stderr
c:simple-property.description: Enable capturing of stderr into log files; enabled by default

c:simple-property.name: stats_start_collector
c:simple-property.description: needed for block or row stats; enabled by default

c:simple-property.name: stats_block_level
c:simple-property.description: Enables the collection of block-level statistics on database activity; if this option is enabled, the data that is produced can be accessed via the pg_stat and pg_statio family of system views; disabled by default

c:simple-property.name: stats_row_level
c:simple-property.description: Enables the collection of row-level statistics on database activity; if this option is enabled, the data that is produced can be accessed via the pg_stat and pg_statio family of system views; disabled by default

c:simple-property.name: autovacuum
c:simple-property.description: Enable autovacuum subprocess? (requires stats_start_collector and stats_row_level to also be on); enabled by default

c:simple-property.name: add_missing_from
c:simple-property.description: Automatically adds missing table references to FROM clauses; default value is 'off'.

c:simple-property.name: allow_system_table_mods
c:simple-property.description: Allows modifications of the structure of system tables; default value is 'off'.

c:simple-property.name: archive_command
c:simple-property.description: WAL archiving command; default value is ''.

c:simple-property.name: archive_timeout
c:simple-property.description: Forces a switch to the next xlog file if a new file has not been started within the specified amount of time; default unit is seconds; default value is '0'.

c:simple-property.name: array_nulls
c:simple-property.description: Enable input of NULL elements in arrays.

c:simple-property.name: authentication_timeout
c:simple-property.description: Sets the maximum allowed time to complete client authentication; default unit is seconds; default value is '60'.

c:simple-property.name: autovacuum
c:simple-property.description: Starts the autovacuum subprocess.

c:simple-property.name: autovacuum_analyze_scale_factor
c:simple-property.description: Number of tuple inserts, updates or deletes prior to analyze as a fraction of reltuples.

c:simple-property.name: autovacuum_analyze_threshold
c:simple-property.description: Minimum number of tuple inserts, updates or deletes prior to analyze.

c:simple-property.name: autovacuum_freeze_max_age
c:simple-property.description: Age (in transactions) at which to autovacuum a table to prevent transaction ID wraparound.

c:simple-property.name: autovacuum_naptime
c:simple-property.description: Amount of time to sleep between autovacuum runs; default unit is seconds; default value is '60'.

c:simple-property.name: autovacuum_vacuum_cost_delay
c:simple-property.description: Vacuum cost delay for autovacuum; default unit is milliseconds; default value is '-1'.

c:simple-property.name: autovacuum_vacuum_cost_limit
c:simple-property.description: Vacuum cost amount available before napping, for autovacuum.

c:simple-property.name: autovacuum_vacuum_scale_factor
c:simple-property.description: Number of tuple updates or deletes prior to vacuum as a fraction of reltuples.

c:simple-property.name: autovacuum_vacuum_threshold
c:simple-property.description: Minimum number of tuple updates or deletes prior to vacuum.

c:simple-property.name: backslash_quote
c:simple-property.description: Sets whether quotes are allowed in string literals

c:simple-property.name: bgwriter_all_maxpages
c:simple-property.description: Background writer maximum number of all pages to flush per round

c:simple-property.name: bgwriter_all_percent
c:simple-property.description: Background writer percentage of all buffers to flush per round

c:simple-property.name: bgwriter_delay
c:simple-property.description: Background writer sleep time between rounds; default unit is milliseconds; default value is '200'.

c:simple-property.name: bgwriter_lru_maxpages
c:simple-property.description: Background writer maximum number of LRU pages to flush per round

c:simple-property.name: bgwriter_lru_percent
c:simple-property.description: Background writer percentage of LRU buffers to flush per round

c:simple-property.name: block_size
c:simple-property.description: Shows size of a disk block; determined by the value of BLCKSZ when building the server; default unit is bytes; default value is '8192'.

c:simple-property.name: bonjour_name
c:simple-property.description: Sets the Bonjour broadcast service name; default value is the computer name.

c:simple-property.name: check_function_bodies
c:simple-property.description: Check function bodies during CREATE FUNCTION.

c:simple-property.name: checkpoint_segments
c:simple-property.description: Sets the maximum distance (in log segments) between automatic WAL checkpoints.

c:simple-property.name: checkpoint_timeout
c:simple-property.description: Sets the maximum amount of time between automatic WAL checkpoints; default unit is seconds; default value is '300'.

c:simple-property.name: checkpoint_warning
c:simple-property.description: Logs if filling of checkpoint segments happens more frequently than this amount of time; default unit is seconds; default value is '30'.

c:simple-property.name: client_encoding
c:simple-property.description: Sets the client's character set encoding.

c:simple-property.name: client_min_messages
c:simple-property.description: Sets the message levels that are sent to the client.

c:simple-property.name: commit_delay
c:simple-property.description: Sets the delay in between transaction commit and flushing WAL to disk; default unit is microseconds; default value is '0'.

c:simple-property.name: commit_siblings
c:simple-property.description: Sets the minimum concurrent open transactions before performing commit_delay.

c:simple-property.name: config_file
c:simple-property.description: Sets the server's main configuration file.

c:simple-property.name: constraint_exclusion
c:simple-property.description: Enables the planner to use constraints to optimize queries.

c:simple-property.name: cpu_index_tuple_cost
c:simple-property.description: Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of processing each index entry during an index scan; measured on the same scale as the seq_page_cost configuration parameter; default value is '0.001'.

c:simple-property.name: cpu_operator_cost
c:simple-property.description: Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of processing each operator or function call; measured on the same scale as the seq_page_cost configuration parameter; default value is '0.0025'.

c:simple-property.name: cpu_tuple_cost
c:simple-property.description: Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of processing each tuple (row); measured on the same scale as the seq_page_cost configuration parameter; default value is '0.01'.

c:simple-property.name: custom_variable_classes
c:simple-property.description: Sets the list of known custom variable classes; default value is ''.

c:simple-property.name: data_directory
c:simple-property.description: Sets the server's data directory.

c:simple-property.name: DateStyle
c:simple-property.description: Sets the display format for date and time values.

c:simple-property.name: db_user_namespace
c:simple-property.description: Enables per-database user names.

c:simple-property.name: deadlock_timeout
c:simple-property.description: The amount of time to wait on lock before checking for a deadlock; default unit is milliseconds; default value is '1000'.

c:simple-property.name: debug_assertions
c:simple-property.description: Turns on various assertion checks.

c:simple-property.name: debug_pretty_print
c:simple-property.description: Indents parse and plan tree displays.

c:simple-property.name: debug_print_parse
c:simple-property.description: Prints the parse tree to the server log.

c:simple-property.name: debug_print_plan
c:simple-property.description: Prints the execution plan to server log.

c:simple-property.name: debug_print_rewritten
c:simple-property.description: Prints the parse tree after rewriting to server log.

c:simple-property.name: default_statistics_target
c:simple-property.description: Sets the default statistics target; range 1-1000.

c:simple-property.name: default_tablespace
c:simple-property.description: Sets the default tablespace to create tables and indexes in.

c:simple-property.name: default_transaction_isolation
c:simple-property.description: Sets the transaction isolation level of each new transaction.

c:simple-property.name: default_transaction_read_only
c:simple-property.description: Sets the default read-only status of new transactions.

c:simple-property.name: default_with_oids
c:simple-property.description: Create new tables with OIDs by default.

c:simple-property.name: dynamic_library_path
c:simple-property.description: Sets the path for dynamically loadable modules.

c:simple-property.name: effective_cache_size
c:simple-property.description: Sets the planner's assumption about size of the disk cache; the unit is disk pages, which are normally 8KB each; default value is '1000'.

c:simple-property.name: enable_bitmapscan
c:simple-property.description: Enables the planner's use of bitmap-scan plans.

c:simple-property.name: enable_hashagg
c:simple-property.description: Enables the planner's use of hashed aggregation plans.

c:simple-property.name: enable_hashjoin
c:simple-property.description: Enables the planner's use of hash join plans.

c:simple-property.name: enable_indexscan
c:simple-property.description: Enables the planner's use of index-scan plans.

c:simple-property.name: enable_mergejoin
c:simple-property.description: Enables the planner's use of merge join plans.

c:simple-property.name: enable_nestloop
c:simple-property.description: Enables the planner's use of nested-loop join plans.

c:simple-property.name: enable_seqscan
c:simple-property.description: Enables the planner's use of sequential-scan plans.

c:simple-property.name: enable_sort
c:simple-property.description: Enables the planner's use of explicit sort steps.

c:simple-property.name: enable_tidscan
c:simple-property.description: Enables the planner's use of TID scan plans.

c:simple-property.name: escape_string_warning
c:simple-property.description: Warn about backslash escapes in ordinary string literals.

c:simple-property.name: explain_pretty_print
c:simple-property.description: Uses the indented output format for EXPLAIN VERBOSE.

c:simple-property.name: external_pid_file
c:simple-property.description: Writes the postmaster PID to the specified file.

c:simple-property.name: extra_float_digits
c:simple-property.description: Sets the number of extra digits displayed for floating-point values.

c:simple-property.name: from_collapse_limit
c:simple-property.description: Sets the FROM-list size beyond which subqueries are not collapsed; default value is 8.

c:simple-property.name: fsync
c:simple-property.description: Forces synchronization of updates to disk.

c:simple-property.name: full_page_writes
c:simple-property.description: Writes full pages to WAL when first modified after a checkpoint.

c:simple-property.name: geqo
c:simple-property.description: Enables genetic query optimization; default value is on.

c:simple-property.name: geqo_effort
c:simple-property.description: GEQO: effort is used to set the default for other GEQO parameters; range 1-10; default value is 5.

c:simple-property.name: geqo_generations
c:simple-property.description: GEQO: number of iterations of the algorithm; default selected based on effort.

c:simple-property.name: geqo_pool_size
c:simple-property.description: GEQO: number of individuals in the population; default selected based on effort.

c:simple-property.name: geqo_selection_bias
c:simple-property.description: GEQO: selective pressure within the population.

c:simple-property.name: geqo_threshold
c:simple-property.description: Sets the threshold of FROM items beyond which GEQO is used.

c:simple-property.name: gin_fuzzy_search_limit
c:simple-property.description: Sets the maximum allowed result for exact search by GIN.

c:simple-property.name: hba_file
c:simple-property.description: Sets the server's hba [configuration file]

c:simple-property.name: ident_file
c:simple-property.description: Sets the server's ident [configuration file]

c:simple-property.name: ignore_system_indexes
c:simple-property.description: Disables reading from system indexes.

c:simple-property.name: integer_datetimes
c:simple-property.description: Datetimes are integer based.

c:simple-property.name: join_collapse_limit
c:simple-property.description: Sets the FROM-list size beyond which JOIN constructs are not flattened; default value is '8'.

c:simple-property.name: krb_caseins_users
c:simple-property.description: Sets whether Kerberos user names should be treated as case-insensitive.

c:simple-property.name: krb_server_hostname
c:simple-property.description: Sets the hostname of the Kerberos server.

c:simple-property.name: krb_server_keyfile
c:simple-property.description: Sets the location of the Kerberos server key file.

c:simple-property.name: krb_srvname
c:simple-property.description: Sets the name of the Kerberos service.

c:simple-property.name: lc_collate
c:simple-property.description: Shows the collation order locale.

c:simple-property.name: lc_ctype
c:simple-property.description: Shows the character classification and case conversion locale.

c:simple-property.name: lc_messages
c:simple-property.description: Sets the language in which messages are displayed.

c:simple-property.name: lc_monetary
c:simple-property.description: Sets the locale for formatting monetary amounts.

c:simple-property.name: lc_numeric
c:simple-property.description: Sets the locale for formatting numbers.

c:simple-property.name: lc_time
c:simple-property.description: Sets the locale for formatting date and time values.

c:simple-property.name: listen_addresses
c:simple-property.description: Sets the host name or IP address(es) to listen to.

c:simple-property.name: local_preload_libraries
c:simple-property.description: Lists shared libraries to preload into each backend.

c:simple-property.name: log_connections
c:simple-property.description: Logs each successful connection.

c:simple-property.name: log_destination
c:simple-property.description: Sets the destination for server log output.

c:simple-property.name: log_directory
c:simple-property.description: Sets the destination directory for log files.

c:simple-property.name: log_disconnections
c:simple-property.description: Logs end of a session, including duration.

c:simple-property.name: log_duration
c:simple-property.description: Logs the duration of each completed SQL statement.

c:simple-property.name: log_error_verbosity
c:simple-property.description: Sets the verbosity of logged messages.

c:simple-property.name: log_executor_stats
c:simple-property.description: Writes executor performance statistics to the server log.

c:simple-property.name: log_filename
c:simple-property.description: Sets the file name pattern for log files.

c:simple-property.name: log_hostname
c:simple-property.description: Logs the host name in the connection logs.

c:simple-property.name: log_line_prefix
c:simple-property.description: Controls information prefixed to each log line

c:simple-property.name: log_min_duration_statement
c:simple-property.description: Sets the minimum execution time (in milliseconds) above which statements will be logged.

c:simple-property.name: log_min_error_statement
c:simple-property.description: Causes all statements generating error at or above this level to be logged.

c:simple-property.name: log_min_messages
c:simple-property.description: Sets the message levels that are logged.

c:simple-property.name: log_parser_stats
c:simple-property.description: Writes parser performance statistics to the server log.

c:simple-property.name: log_planner_stats
c:simple-property.description: Writes planner performance statistics to the server log.

c:simple-property.name: log_rotation_age
c:simple-property.description: Automatic log file rotation will occur after this amount of time; default unit is minutes; default value is '1440' (1d).

c:simple-property.name: log_rotation_size
c:simple-property.description: Automatic log file rotation will occur when the file reaches this size; default unit is kilobytes; default value is '10240' (i.e. 10MB).

c:simple-property.name: log_statement
c:simple-property.description: Sets the type of statements logged.

c:simple-property.name: log_statement_stats
c:simple-property.description: Writes cumulative performance statistics to the server log.

c:simple-property.name: log_truncate_on_rotation
c:simple-property.description: Truncate existing log files of same name during log rotation.

c:simple-property.name: maintenance_work_mem
c:simple-property.description: Sets the maximum memory to be used for maintenance operations.

c:simple-property.name: max_connections
c:simple-property.description: Sets the maximum number of concurrent connections.

c:simple-property.name: max_files_per_process
c:simple-property.description: Sets the maximum number of simultaneously open files for each server process.

c:simple-property.name: max_fsm_pages
c:simple-property.description: Sets the maximum number of disk pages for which free space is tracked.

c:simple-property.name: max_fsm_relations
c:simple-property.description: Sets the maximum number of tables and indexes for which free space is tracked.

c:simple-property.name: max_function_args
c:simple-property.description: Shows the maximum number of function arguments.

c:simple-property.name: max_identifier_length
c:simple-property.description: Shows the maximum identifier length

c:simple-property.name: max_index_keys
c:simple-property.description: Shows the maximum number of index keys.

c:simple-property.name: max_locks_per_transaction
c:simple-property.description: Sets the maximum number of locks per transaction.

c:simple-property.name: max_prepared_transactions
c:simple-property.description: Sets the maximum number of simultaneously prepared transactions.

c:simple-property.name: max_stack_depth
c:simple-property.description: Sets the maximum size of the server's execution stack; default unit is kilobytes; default value is '2048' (i.e. 2MB).

c:simple-property.name: password_encryption
c:simple-property.description: Encrypt passwords.

c:simple-property.name: port
c:simple-property.description: Sets the TCP port the server listens on; default value is '5432'.

c:simple-property.name: post_auth_delay
c:simple-property.description: Waits the specified amount of time on connection startup after authentication; default unit is seconds; default value is '0'.

c:simple-property.name: pre_auth_delay
c:simple-property.description: Waits the specified amount of time on connection startup before authentication; default unit is seconds; default value is '0'.

c:simple-property.name: random_page_cost
c:simple-property.description: Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of a nonsequentially fetched disk page; measured on the same scale as the seq_page_cost configuration parameter; default value is '4'.

c:simple-property.name: redirect_stderr
c:simple-property.description: Start a subprocess to capture stderr output into log files; default value is 'on'.

c:simple-property.name: regex_flavor
c:simple-property.description: Sets the regular expression flavor.

c:simple-property.name: search_path
c:simple-property.description: Sets the schema search order for names that are not schema-qualified.

c:simple-property.name: seq_page_cost
c:simple-property.description: Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of a sequentially fetched disk page; measured on an arbitrary scale.

c:simple-property.name: server_encoding
c:simple-property.description: Sets the server (database) character set encoding.

c:simple-property.name: server_version
c:simple-property.description: Shows the PostgreSQL version.

c:simple-property.name: server_version_num
c:simple-property.description: Shows the PostgreSQL version as an integer (e.g. 80204 translates to 8.2.4).

c:simple-property.name: shared_buffers
c:simple-property.description: Sets the amount of memory for the shared memory buffers used by the server; default value is typically '32MB'. The value must be minimum 128kB or max_connections*16kB.

c:simple-property.name: shared_preload_libraries
c:simple-property.description: Lists shared libraries to preload into server.

c:simple-property.name: silent_mode
c:simple-property.description: Runs the server silently.

c:simple-property.name: sql_inheritance
c:simple-property.description: Causes subtables to be included by default in various commands.

c:simple-property.name: ssl
c:simple-property.description: Enables SSL connections.

c:simple-property.name: standard_conforming_strings
c:simple-property.description: '...' strings treat backslashes literally.

c:simple-property.name: statement_timeout
c:simple-property.description: Sets the maximum allowed duration of any statement; default unit is milliseconds; default value is '0'.

c:simple-property.name: stats_block_level
c:simple-property.description: Collects block-level statistics on database activity.

c:simple-property.name: stats_command_string
c:simple-property.description: Collects information about executing commands.

c:simple-property.name: stats_reset_on_server_start
c:simple-property.description: Zeroes collected statistics on server restart.

c:simple-property.name: stats_row_level
c:simple-property.description: Collects row-level statistics on database activity.

c:simple-property.name: stats_start_collector
c:simple-property.description: Starts the server statistics-collection subprocess.

c:simple-property.name: superuser_reserved_connections
c:simple-property.description: Sets the number of connection slots reserved for superusers; default value is '3'.

c:simple-property.name: tcp_keepalives_count
c:simple-property.description: Maximum number of TCP keepalive retransmits; '0' selects the system default; default value is '0'.

c:simple-property.name: tcp_keepalives_idle
c:simple-property.description: Amount of time between issuing TCP keepalives; '0' selects the system default; default unit is seconds; default value is '0'.

c:simple-property.name: tcp_keepalives_interval
c:simple-property.description: Amount of time between TCP keepalive retransmits; '0' selects the system default; default unit is seconds; default value is '0'.

c:simple-property.name: temp_buffers
c:simple-property.description: Sets the maximum number of temporary buffers used by each session.

c:simple-property.name: TimeZone
c:simple-property.description: Sets the time zone for displaying and interpreting time stamps.

c:simple-property.name: timezone_abbreviations
c:simple-property.description: Selects a file of time zone abbreviations

c:simple-property.name: trace_notify
c:simple-property.description: Generates debugging output for LISTEN and NOTIFY.

c:simple-property.name: trace_sort
c:simple-property.description: Emit information about resource usage in sorting.

c:simple-property.name: transaction_isolation
c:simple-property.description: Sets the current transaction's isolation level.

c:simple-property.name: transaction_read_only
c:simple-property.description: Sets the current transaction's read-only status.

c:simple-property.name: transform_null_equals
c:simple-property.description: Treats expr=NULL as expr IS NULL

c:simple-property.name: unix_socket_directory
c:simple-property.description: Sets the directory where the Unix-domain socket will be created; default value is ''.

c:simple-property.name: unix_socket_group
c:simple-property.description: Sets the owning group of the Unix-domain socket; default value is ''.

c:simple-property.name: unix_socket_permissions
c:simple-property.description: Sets the access permissions of the Unix-domain socket; default value is '511'.

c:simple-property.name: update_process_title
c:simple-property.description: Updates the process title to show the active SQL command.

c:simple-property.name: vacuum_cost_delay
c:simple-property.description: Vacuum cost delay; default unit is milliseconds; range 0-1000; default value is '0'.

c:simple-property.name: vacuum_cost_limit
c:simple-property.description: Vacuum cost (in credits) amount available before napping.

c:simple-property.name: vacuum_cost_page_dirty
c:simple-property.description: Vacuum cost (in credits) for a page dirtied by vacuum; range 0-10000; default value is '20'.

c:simple-property.name: vacuum_cost_page_hit
c:simple-property.description: Vacuum cost (in credits) for a page found in the buffer cache; range 0-10000; default value is '1'.

c:simple-property.name: vacuum_cost_page_miss
c:simple-property.description: Vacuum cost (in credits) for a page not found in the buffer cache; range 0-10000; default value is '10'.

c:simple-property.name: vacuum_freeze_min_age
c:simple-property.description: Minimum age (in transactions) at which VACUUM should freeze a table row.

c:simple-property.name: wal_buffers
c:simple-property.description: Sets the number of disk-page buffers in shared memory for WAL; default value is '8'.

c:simple-property.name: wal_sync_method
c:simple-property.description: Selects the method used for forcing WAL updates out to disk.

c:simple-property.name: work_mem
c:simple-property.description: Sets the maximum memory to be used for query workspaces; default unit is kilobytes; default value is '1000' (i.e. 1MB).

c:simple-property.name: zero_damaged_pages
c:simple-property.description: Continues processing past damaged page headers.

operation.name: resetStatistics
operation.description: Resets the statistics in this database

c:simple-property.description: data type of the column, if it is a built-in type, or ARRAY if it is some array (in that case, see the view element_types), else USER-DEFINED (in that case, the type is identified in udt_name and associated columns).

c:simple-property.name: columnLength
c:simple-property.description: if data_type identifies a character or bit string type, the declared maximum length; null for all other data types or if no maximum length was declared

c:simple-property.name: columnPrecision
c:simple-property.description: if data_type identifies a numeric type, this column contains the (declared or implicit) precision of the type for this column; the precision indicates the number of significant digits. It can be expressed in decimal (base 10) or binary (base 2) terms, as specified in the column numeric_precision_radix; for all other data types, this column is null

c:simple-property.name: columnNullable
c:simple-property.description: YES if the column is possibly nullable, NO if it is known not nullable; a not-null constraint is one way a column can be known not nullable, but there can be others

c:simple-property.name: columnDefault
